verses.verse: Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> The <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H2691>court<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H4639>working<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> but on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> day it shall be <S%H6605>opened,<s%> and on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> it shall be <S%H6605>opened.<s%>

The <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> by the <S%H4201>post<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and he shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> at the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate:<s%> then he shall go <S%H3318>forth;<s%> but the <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%> until the <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

The <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7812>worship<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of that <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbaths<s%> and on the new <S%H2320>moons.<s%>

The burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> that the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> and a <S%H352>ram<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish;<s%>

and the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as he is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H4991>give,<s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

On the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the new <S%H2320>moon<s%> it shall be a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3532>lambs,<s%> and a <S%H352>ram;<s%> they shall be without <S%H8549>blemish:<s%>

and he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> according as <S%H3027>he<s%> is <S%H5381>able,<s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

When the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H935>enter,<s%> he shall <S%H935>go<s%> in by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and he shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by its <S%H1870>way.<s%>

But when the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the appointed <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> he who <S%H935>enters<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate;<s%> and he who <S%H935>enters<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H8179>gate:<s%> he shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> by which he came <S%H935>in,<s%> but shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> straight before <S%H5226>him.<s%>
<S%H8432>The<s%> <S%H5387>prince,<s%> when they go <S%H935>in,<s%> shall go <S%H935>in<s%> with of <S%H3318>them;<s%> and when they go out, he shall go <S%H3318>out.<s%>

In the <S%H2282>feasts<s%> and in the <S%H4150>solemnities<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall be an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and an <S%H374>ephah<s%> for a <S%H352>ram,<s%> and for the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> as he is <S%H3027>able<s%> to <S%H4991>give,<s%> and a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> to an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>

When the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> or peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> as a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> one shall <S%H6605>open<s%> for him the <S%H8179>gate<s%> that <S%H6437>looks<s%> toward the <S%H6921>east;<s%> and he shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> his burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and his peace <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> as he does on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> then he shall go <S%H3318>forth;<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> his going <S%H3318>forth<s%> one shall <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H8179>gate.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> old without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3117>daily:<s%> <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall prepare <S%H6213>it.<s%>

You shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> with it <S%H1242>morning<s%> by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of an <S%H374>ephah,<s%> and the third <S%H7992>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> to moisten the fine <S%H5560>flour;<s%> a meal <S%H4503>offering<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance.<s%>

Thus shall they <S%H6213>prepare<s%> the <S%H3532>lamb,<s%> and the meal <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and the <S%H8081>oil,<s%> morning by <S%H1242>morning,<s%> for a <S%H8548>continual<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> If the <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> to <S%H376>any<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons,<s%> it is his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> it shall belong to his <S%H1121>sons;<s%> it is their <S%H272>possession<s%> by <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

But if he <S%H5414>give<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> a <S%H4979>gift<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> it shall be his to the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1865>liberty;<s%> then it shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H5387>prince;<s%> but as for his <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> it shall be for his <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H5387>prince<s%> shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>'s <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> <S%H3238>to<s%> <S%H3238>thrust<s%> them out of their <S%H272>possession;<s%> he shall give <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> out of his own <S%H272>possession,<s%> that my <S%H5971>people<s%> not be <S%H6327>scattered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> from his <S%H272>possession.<s%>

Then he <S%H935>brought<s%> me through the <S%H3996>entry,<s%> which was at the <S%H3802>side<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> into the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3957>rooms<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> which <S%H6437>looked<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north:<s%> and <S%H4725>behold,<s%> there was a place on the hinder <S%H3411>part<s%> <S%H3220>westward.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4725>me,<s%> This is the place where the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> the trespass <S%H817>offering<s%> and the sin <S%H2403>offering,<s%> and where they shall <S%H644>bake<s%> the meal <S%H4503>offering;<s%> that they not <S%H3318>bring<s%> them forth into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Then he brought me <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H2435>outer<s%> <S%H2691>court,<s%> and caused me to pass <S%H5674>by<s%> the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%> and <S%H4740>behold,<s%> in every <S%H4740>corner<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> there was a <S%H2691>court.<s%>

In the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4740>corners<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> there were <S%H2691>courts<s%> <S%H7000>enclosed,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> cubits <S%H753>long<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H7341>broad:<s%> these <S%H702>four<s%> in the <S%H7106>corners<s%> were of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

There was a <S%H2905>wall<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> in <S%H5439>them,<s%> around the <S%H702>four,<s%> and boiling <S%H4018>places<s%> were <S%H6213>made<s%> under the <S%H2918>walls<s%> all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1310>me,<s%> These are the boiling <S%H1004>houses,<s%> where the <S%H8334>ministers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H1310>boil<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
